about_the_game:
Travel through the rift to the strange dimension of Zion in a sci-fi movement-based fps. Take down a 2-faced corporation in an attempt to save everything from ultimate destruction as a badass futuristic runaway rebel with a sword. Far from home you learn about the schemes of a company fueled by greed and learn more about what it means to be human all while discovering the untold secrets of Zion.

Zion is an alternate dimensions that lies beyond the rift. Its full of multiple different impossible biomes that defy all common sense and even physics itself. Parkour your way around gravity defying canyons and dive into the deepest underwater caves. Uncover the secrets of Zion and adapt to the ever changing environment and its untamed wildlife.

Play as an orphan street boy named Kyra who joins the famous Zion explorer program and becomes what they call a shikari to pay off his crippling debt. Only to slowly pull back the curtain on Mono, the organization in charge, and their plan that could destroy everything. Fight against the odds to uncover the mystery and take them down.

Rift's singleplayer will release in 3 episodes. Each one containing 2 chapters containing a variety of missions and new content.

short_description: Pull the curtain back on a two-faced corporation while dimension hopping to evade the bounty on your head. Rift: Genesis is a super stylish momentum based movement shooter coupled with physics based melee combat and satisfying gunplay.
